tags.name: DepositProducts
tags.description: WARNING: Please use these APIs only to migrate products across your environments. We are working to update these endpoints, yet until then do not attempt to create products from scratch via the APIs as you may damage your Mambu instance.

post.summary: Perform batch update action for the specified deposit product

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Key that can be used to support idempotency on this POST. Must be a valid UUID(version 4 is recommended) string and can only be used with the exact same request. Can be used in retry mechanisms to prevent double posting.

parameters.name: depositProductId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the deposit product to perform batch update action

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Allows specifying the batch update action details for a deposit product

202.description: Batch update action accepted for the specified deposit product

102.description: Your idempotent request was already submitted and is currently being processed, try again later.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Key that can be used to support idempotency on this POST. Must be a valid UUID(version 4 is recommended) string and can only be used with the exact same request. Can be used in retry mechanisms to prevent double posting.

102.description: Your idempotent request was already submitted and is currently being processed, try again later.

get.summary: Allows retrieval of a single deposit product via id or encoded key

parameters.name: depositProductId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the deposit product to be retrieved

parameters.name: detailsLevel
parameters.description: The level of details to retrieve, FULL means the full details of the object will be retrieved (custom fields, address, contact info or any other related object), BASIC will return only the first level elements of the object

parameters.name: depositProductId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the deposit product to be updated

parameters.name: depositProductId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the deposit product to be deleted

patch.summary: Partially update an existing deposit product

parameters.name: depositProductId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the deposit product to be updated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Patch operations to be applied to a resource

defaultValue.description: The default value, will be used in case no other value was filled in by the user.

interestRateSettings.description: Interest Rate Settings holds information about interest rate applied to the product

daysInYear.description: How many days in a year should be used for interest calculations

interestCalculationBalance.description: The balance which is used for the overdraft interest calculation. Default value is MINIMUM. If set to null on a PUT call and the product allows overdrafts, the null value is ignored and not changed.

MonthAndDay.description: Wrapper for month and day for instances where the year isn't needed

currencies.description: Currencies that can be used by accounts of this product

notes.description: Some notes/a description about the product

lastModifiedDate.description: The last date the product was updated

feesSettings.description: Defines the fees settings for the product.

offsetSettings.description: The offset settings, holds information about offset.

creationDate.description: The date this product was created

maturitySettings.description: The maturity settings for the product.

newAccountSettings.description: Defines the settings and constraints used by new account created based on this product.

interestSettings.description: The interest settings and constraints for the product.

accountingSettings.description: Defines the accounting settings for the product.

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the deposit product, auto generated, unique

id.description: The id of the product, can be generated and customized, unique

state.description: Indicates the current state of the product

overdraftSettings.description: The overdraft settings and constraints for the product.

internalControls.description: The constraints and automated actions and that will be applied on the accounts.

overdraftInterestSettings.description: The overdraft interest settings and constraints for the product.

DepositProduct.description: A deposit product defines the terms and constraints on deposit accounts

interestRate.description: Defines the constraints for interest rate as interval (min/max/default).

interestRateReviewUnit.description: Interest rate review frequency measurement unit

interestRateSource.description: Interest calculation method: fixed or (interest spread + active organization index interest rate)

interestRateReviewCount.description: Interest rate review frequency unit count

interestRateTiers.description: The list of interest rate tiers available for the current settings instance

interestChargeFrequency.description: The interval used for determining how often is interest charged

interestRateTerms.description: The option for how is the interest rate determined when being accrued for an account

interestChargeFrequencyCount.description: the count of units to apply over the interval

DepositProductOverdraftInterestRateSetti.description: The overdraft interest settings, defines constraints regarding interest that will be used on the account created based on this product.

Currency.description: Represents a currency eg. USD, EUR.

path.description: The field to perform the operation on

from.description: The field from where a value should be moved, when using move

value.description: The value of the field, can be null

PatchOperation.description: A single change that needs to be made to a resource

DepositMaturitySettings.description: The maturity settings for the product.

idGeneratorType.description: The type of generator used for IDs creation.

idPattern.description: The pattern that will be used for ID validation (as referred to as an input mask).

DepositNewAccountSettings.description: New Account settings for deposit accounts

interestRateSettings.description: Interest Rate Settings holds information about interest rate applied to the product

collectInterestWhenLocked.description: Whether locked accounts still collect Interest or not

interestCalculationBalance.description: The balance which is used for the Interest calculation

interestPaidIntoAccount.description: If interest should be payed into the deposit account

maximumBalance.description: The maximum balance used for Interest calculation

daysInYear.description: How many days in a year should be used for interest calculations

interestPaymentSettings.description: Defines the interest payment settings for the deposit product and for deposits created based on this product

DepositProductInterestSettings.description: The interest settings, defines constraints regarding interest that will be used on the deposit account based on this product.

allowOffset.description: Specify if the product allow to create accounts which can be used as offset for loans

DepositProductOffsetSettings.description: The offset settings, holds information about offset.

accountingRules.description: A list of accounting rules defined for this fee. If null, product default rules are selected.

amountCalculationMethod.description: The amount from which the fee is calculated using percentageAmount

feeApplication.description: The type of fee application when disbursement is applied

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the predefined fee, auto generated, unique

trigger.description: Shows the event that will trigger a fee

state.description: Indicates the state of the fee

creationDate.description: Shows the creation date of the fee

applyDateMethod.description: Shows when a fee should be applied; to be used with monthly deposit fees

DepositProductPredefinedFee.description: The response representation of the PredefinedFee. Represents a fee with a defined name and a fixed value.

defaultValue.description: The default value, will be used in case no other value was filled in by the user.
The default value, will be used in case no other value was filled in by the user.

forAllBranches.description: Indicates if this product should be available for all branches

availableProductBranches.description: Holds the encoded keys of the branches this product should be available for.

BranchSettings.description: Holds information about branch availability for the product.

dormancyPeriodDays.description: Specifies the number of days for an account to be fully paid in order to auto close it.

openingBalance.description: The constraints for the minimum, max and default opening balance for a deposit account using this product

DepositProductInternalControls.description: Constraints and automated actions and that will be applied on the accounts.

accountingMethod.description: A list of accounting rules for the product.

accountingRules.description: A list of accounting rules for the product.

interestAccruedAccountingMethod.description: A list of accounting rules for the product.

DepositProductAccountingSettings.description: Accounting settings, defines the accounting settings for the product.

interestRate.description: Defines the constraints for interest rate as interval (min/max/default).

interestRateSource.description: Interest calculation method: fixed or (interest spread + active organization index interest rate)

interestRateTiers.description: The list of interest rate tiers available for the current settings instance

interestChargeFrequency.description: The interval used for determining how often is interest charged

accrueInterestAfterMaturity.description: If the product supports this option, specify if the interest should be accrued after the account maturity date

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the interest rate tier, auto generated, unique

interestRateTerms.description: The option for how is the interest rate determined when being accrued for an account

interestChargeFrequencyCount.description: the count of units to apply over the interval

DepositProductInterestRateSettings.description: The interest settings, defines constraints regarding interest that will be used on the deposit created based on this product.

creditArrangementRequirement.description: Shows whether accounts created after this product can/should be part of a line of credit.

CreditArrangementSettings.description: The funding settings, holds the settings regarding the funding for the loan product.

endingBalance.description: The top-limit value for the account balance in order to determine if this tier is used or not

interestRate.description: The rate used for computing the interest for an account which has the balance less than the ending balance

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the interest rate tier, auto generated, unique

DepositProductOverdraftInterestRateTier.description: Used or TIERED interest rates, holds the values to define how the interest is computed

withholdingTaxEnabled.description: Whether withholding taxes are enabled for this product or not

DepositProductTaxSettings.description: Tax settings, defines some settings for taxes on the loan product

branchSettings.description: Holds information about branch availability for the product.

availableFor.description: Holds the entities this product is available for. i.e Individuals

allowOverdraft.description: Whether the accounts for this product may have overdraft

allowTechnicalOverdraft.description: Whether the accounts for this product may have technical overdraft

maxOverdraftLimit.description: How much money may be taken out for the account to go negative

DepositProductOverdraftSettings.description: The overdraft settings of the deposit product

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the accounting rule, auto generated, unique.

glAccountKey.description: The encoded key of the account that is mapped to the financialResource

financialResource.description: General Ledger Financial Resources used to setup the product accounting rules and determine the credit and debit accounts when logging journal entries

DepositGLAccountingRule.description: The GL accounting rule, it maps a financial resource with a GL account for a specific product (i.e loan or saving).

interestPaymentDates.description: List of all dates on which the interest is payed into deposit account

interestPaymentPoint.description: Specifies when the interest should be paid to the deposit account

InterestPaymentSettings.description: Defines the interest payment settings for the deposit product and for deposits created based on this product

action.description: The action type to be applied. When UPDATE_INTEREST_SETTINGS action type is used, all the existing deposit accounts will be updated with the latest interest-related fields at the end of day job execution

DepositProductAction.description: Allows specifying the batch update action details for a deposit product

fees.description: List of all fees that can be applied for accounts of this loan product.

allowArbitraryFees.description: Only if true users will be able to apply fees, for current object, of type 'Other'; these fees can have any amount.

DepositProductFeeSettings.description: Defines fees settings for the product.

endingBalance.description: The top-limit value for the account balance in order to determine if this tier is used or not

interestRate.description: The rate used for computing the interest for an account which has the balance less than the ending balance

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the interest rate tier, auto generated, unique

endingDay.description: The top-limit value for the account period since activation in order to determine if this tier is used or not

DepositProductInterestRateTier.description: Used or TIERED interest rates, holds the values to define how the interest is computed

state.description: The state of the deposit product action

DepositProductActionResponse.description: Represents a response for executing batch update action for a deposit product
